definitions.definition: To cover with small spots (of some liquid).
definitions.example: His jacket was dotted with splashes of paint.

definitions.definition: To add a dot (the symbol) or dots to.
definitions.example: Dot your is and cross your ts.

definitions.definition: To mark by means of dots or small spots.
To mark or diversify with small detached objects.
definitions.example: to dot a landscape with cottages

definitions.definition: (of a line) Made up of a series of dots.
definitions.example: Please print your name and address clearly on the dotted line.

definitions.definition: (of notes and rests) With a dot after, increasing the value of the duration by half of the basic note.
